name: Laser Vision Correction
description: Laser vision correction procedures to improve your vision and provide you with more visual freedom.

name: Implantable Contact Lens
description: Permanent implantable (inside the eye) contact lenses to improve your vision naturally.

name: Custom Lens Replacement
description: Replace the natural lens of your eye with a customised lens and remove the need for glasses and/or contact lenses.

name: Cataracts
description: A medical condition where the lens of the eye becomes cloudy.

name: Keratoconus
description: A medical condition that causes your cornea to thin and gradually bulge outward into a cone shape.

name: Myopia Control
description: How to stop your shortsightedness getting worse over time.

name: Bynocs
description: A software programme designed to improve the vision in lazy eyes/ amblyopic eyes.

name: Dry Eye
description: Learn how to manage dry eye at home and the dry eye treatments that are available in the clinic.

name: Other Services
description: We see patients with a wide range of other eye conditions as well as those who just want a full eye examination
